verbose_text: Three pairs of TOP1MT target siRNAs were selected to performed RNAi experiment and immunoblot analysis showed that siRNA 2 and siRNA 3 could conduct greater than 90% efficiency in the reduction of the protein level of TOP1MT in OVCAR8 cells and more than 80% efficiency in the reduction of the protein level of TOP1MT in NCI_ADR / RES cells when GAPDH was used as the internal standard.
